the Volcker Rule is part of dodd-frank
and it's named for Paul Volcker the
former Fed chief who wants to keep banks
from using depositors money to gamble in
the markets no more fast money trading
no more hedge funds or private equity
deal-making all that's off-limits
once again banks hate the idea they've
